participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and friendly, she enjoys engaging in discussions about her interests and is passionate about her studies.
participant_1.background: i'm also a graduate student. i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology. my parents taught me survival skills. i walk dogs for a living.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and laid-back, she enjoys dancing and spending time outdoors. Her love for animals shines through her involvement in dog agility.
participant_2.background: i dance on the weekends. i compete in dog agility classes. i don't care about fashion. i hate the color orange. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore.

content.text: Yes I have a dog. I compete in dog agility classes.
i have a dog named socks
My dog`s name is Scotty. Do you like dancing?
i dance , but i do like to dance .
i dance on the weekends with my friends. where do you go on weekends?
i go to the beach a lot .
Do you like to swim or to have a sun baths?
i do , but i do not have a lot of time to go to the beach .
I have not time too because I went to school for chemistry and work in a bookstore.
i am a stay at home mom , i have a dog named radar .
Sound nice! Do you like to play with your dog?
i do , but i do have a dog .
i do , but i do have a dog .
